amendatorysection.catchline: State civil offices; vacancy; how filled.
amendatorysection.para: Every state civil office filled by appointment shall be vacant upon the happening of any one of the events listed in section 32-560 except as provided in section 32-561. The resignation of the incumbent of such a civil office may be made as provided in section 32-562. Vacancies in such a civil office shall be filled as provided in section 32-567 and shall be subject to section 32-563.
